summary: Configure app Buttons: Button 1 (News) to allow manual URL input when no country news is available, and Button 6 to become an Interview feature with file upload, AI question extraction, answer capture, and performance analysis sent to Progress Report.

existing_features.title: When a news region has no available news items (i.e., the News section is in its empty state), render a URL input field that lets the user paste a news website link and open that link inside the app.
Persist the user-provided fallback news URL per region (country/region section) so that returning to the News page restores the previously entered URL for that region.
Rename Button 6 on the Home page from "UPSC Interview" to "Interview" and ensure all user-facing text for this feature uses "Interview" terminology.
In the Interview feature, allow uploading PDF and image files and extract text from the uploaded file to generate interview questions from that extracted content.
In the Interview answering step, provide a text box for answers and a microphone button that includes an upload icon, enabling speech-to-text capture into the answer text box.
Store the user's Interview performance analysis into the Progress Report area so the user can review it later from the Progress page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Button 1 (News): when news is unavailable for a country, show a URL input box to paste a news site link and open it inside the app.
Button 6: rename to 'Interview' and allow uploading PDFs/images; AI extracts interview questions from the uploaded file.
Interview (Button 6): provide a text box and a mic button (with upload icon) to submit user answers.
Interview (Button 6): generate performance analysis from user answers and send/store it in the Progress Report.
